item.title: Fast adaptive optics for high-dimensional quantum communications in turbulent channels
item.author: lukasscarfe@gmail.com (Lukas Scarfe)
item.description: We employ a high-speed Adaptive Optics (AO) system to correct real-time wavefront distortions in spatial modes, significantly reducing crosstalk and error rates for OAM-based QKD in turbulent environments.
